newsitem.title: KAZAKHSTAN: Almaty airport works only at night Sept 20-Oct 31.
newsitem.headline: Almaty airport works only at night Sept 20-Oct 31.

text.p: The international airport of Kazakhstan's capital Almaty will work only during the night from September 20 to October 31 due to repairs on its runways, an aviation official said on Friday.

A Kazakhstan Aviation Agency spokesman told Reuters that all flights, including international ones, would depart and arrive at Almaty airport during the night, but passengers would be able to buy tickets during the day as usual.
